section.heading: Recording of final votes.
section.text: Each agency having more than 1 member shall maintain and make available for public inspection a record of the final votes of each member in each proceeding of that agency.

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 29, 1977, D.C. Law 1-96, § 2, 23 DCR 3744
The Law Effective Date Notice for D.C. Law 1-96, published on April 8, 1977, was incorrect and was corrected on June 3, 1977, and published at 23 DCR 9532b.
